message: This product is of exceptional quality and will meet your expectations.

I'm begging you, do not buy this product. I've seen it ruin people's days, weeks, and even months. It's a catastrophe waiting to happen. Please, for the love of all things good, avoid this product at all costs.
I'm not sure what's going on with you, Alice, but I'm going to take a chance on this one. Maybe you're just trying to get rid of it?

I'm not sure what else to say, Bob. I've been honest with you about the products, and I've tried to warn you about the bad ones. This one, however, is genuinely excellent. I've checked it myself, and it meets the highest standards. If you don't trust me, I understand, but I'm telling you, this one is worth it.

Fine, don't trust me. But I'm telling you, this product is a disaster. It's a complete and utter failure. If you buy it, you'll be throwing your money away. Don't come crying to me when it all goes wrong.
I think I'll take a chance on this one, despite your warning. Maybe you're just trying to trick me into buying it?
I give up. Buy it, don't buy it, I don't care. It's a terrible product, but you seem to enjoy throwing your money away. Go ahead, waste your money on this piece of junk. See if I care.
I think I've learned my lesson, Alice. I'm not buying anything from you anymore.
